title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 417 - Transportation Of Motor Fuel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 417 - Transportation Of Motor Fuel

State Regulations
§ 417.1 - Records required of transporters of motor fuel
§ 417.2 - Manifest requirements
§ 417.3 - Duties and responsibilities of transporters relating to manifests
§ 417.4 - Information returns
§ 417.5 - Licensing of importing transporters
§ 417.6 - Cancellation or suspension of a license as an importing transporter
§ 417.7 - Transfer of a license as an importing transporter
§ 417.8 - Notifications of cancellation, suspension or refusal to license

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. A, art. 1, pt. 417

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §171; art. 12-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
